## JsonCompatible.RecordConverter type

A converter which converts a supplied `unknown` value to a valid record of [JsonCompatible](./ts-json-base.jsoncompatibletype.md) values.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type RecordConverter<T, TC = unknown, TK extends string = string> = BaseConverter<Record<TK, JsonCompatibleType<T>>, TC>;
```
**References:** [JsonCompatibleType](./ts-json-base.jsoncompatibletype.md)
